  • Constructor Details

    • College

      public College (GameScreen screen, String name, float x, float y, String flag, String ship, int ship_no, AvailableSpawn invalidSpawn)
      Parameters:
      screen - Visual data
      name - College name i.e. "Alcuin" used for fleet assignment
      x - College position on x-axis
      y - College position on y-axis
      flag - College flag sprite (image name)
      ship - College ship sprite (image name)
      ship_no - Number of college ships to produce
      invalidSpawn - Spawn data to check spawn validity when generating ships

  • Method Details

    • getCoord

      public boolean getCoord (int x, int y)
      Checks ship spawning in at a valid location
      Parameters:
      x - x position to test
      y - y position to test
      Returns:
      isValid : returns the validity of the proposed spawn point
